G

game - package game
 
Game - Class in game
Class operating the main functionality of the game in the user's view enabling features such as menu controls, animation/sound transitions between levels, transferring of player attributes and game level generation.
Game() - Constructor for class game.Game
Initialising a new game
GameLevel - Class in Levels
Superclass for all levels extending the World that enables motion and interactions to be simulated in the game.
GameLevel() - Constructor for class Levels.GameLevel
 
GameLoader - Class in SaveLoadGame
Demonstration of the game state data saved can be read from a text file and reproduced in the view when loaded back
GameLoader(String, Game) - Constructor for class SaveLoadGame.GameLoader
Initialise a new GameLoader
GameSaver - Class in SaveLoadGame
Demonstration of the game state data can be saved to a text file whilst playing the game
GameSaver(String) - Constructor for class SaveLoadGame.GameSaver
Initialise a new GameSaver
GameView - Class in GraphicsInterface
